snippet.title: PERFECT MATTER Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
PERFECT MATTER is a Twin Stick Shooter inspired by classic games of the genre, where you amass independently powerful upgrades that synergize into world shaking phenomena, and use them to lay waste to countless entities across a dying universe.

It is out now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1346800/PERFECT_MATTER/
